New Records: Karl-Anthony Towns became just the third player in team history to record at least 30 points and 10 rebounds in three consecutive games
Key Match Events: The Knicks, who were missing star point guard Jalen Brunson for the first time this season, extended their winning streak to nine games with a 119-103 victory against the Utah Jazz
Jaden Ivey suffered a potentially serious leg injury in the game between the Pistons and the Orlando Magic
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New York Knicks improved their record to 24-10
The Utah Jazz fell to a fifth straight loss with a 7-25 record
Others: The article also covers other NBA games, including the Denver Nuggets' victory over the Atlanta Hawks and the Toronto Raptors' end to an 11-game losing streak
